metadata.title: RICHEN Raspberry Pi 4 Computer Model B Armor Aluminum Alloy Case/Passive Cooling Shell Metal Enclosure Heat Dissipation Compatible with Pi 4B Only(Not Include Raspberry Pi Board) (Without Fan)
features: Ultra-thin design;Aluminum Alloy;CNC Machining;Easy to install.
All ports and slots of the aluminum alloy case can match with Raspberry Pi 4 Model B computer perfectly.
Open case design, don't need to worry about affect wifi signal, it is a great Raspberry Pi 4 heatsink case with good heat dissaption, you do not need to worry about the Pi 4B get too hot.
Note: Raspberry Pi board and Fan are not included.
description: This is an armor aluminum alloy case designed for the Raspberry Pi 4 computer model b, so this armor case is only fit to raspberry pi 4 model b.Please refer to Armor Case if you want armor case for raspberry pi 3 model b+ / 3b; Note: This armor case is only fit to raspberry pi 4 model b;and this is the version without fan.

- Ultra-thin design - Easy to install - Fast Heat dissipation - Smooth and straight aluminum material - All ports and slots of the case can match with Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ /3B perfectly - Open case design, you don't need to worry it will effect wifi signal any more - Reinforced aluminum material, lightweight and durable, long-lasting stainless - With 2 pieces of 2*20 female header to facilitate the use of GPIO pin header. - We use 3 picese silicon cooling pad (the thickness is only 0.5mm) to touch the shell body to dissipate heat.You can use the CPU grease to relace the silicon colling pad to get better heat dissipation.
1 x armor case for raspberry pi 4 model b 1 x Installation screw pack (Spacer F/F M2.5*20, Screw M2.5*6)
